statements: SELECT * FROM website_traffic
SELECT visitor_id, page_visited, time_spent_on_page FROM website_traffic
SELECT page_visited, visit_date FROM website_traffic ORDER BY visit_date DESC
SELECT visitor_id, COUNT(*) AS visit_count FROM website_traffic GROUP BY visitor_id
SELECT visitor_id, AVG(time_spent_on_page) AS avg_time_spent FROM website_traffic GROUP BY visitor_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1
SELECT * FROM website_traffic WHERE visitor_id = 100 ORDER BY visit_id DESC;
SELECT visit_date, page_visited, time_spent_on_page FROM website_traffic WHERE visit_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT visitor_id, COUNT(DISTINCT page_visited) AS unique_pages_visited FROM website_traffic GROUP BY visitor_id;
SELECT visitor_id, AVG(time_spent_on_page) AS avg_time_spent FROM website_traffic WHERE page_visited LIKE '%blog%' GROUP BY visitor_id HAVING AVG(time_spent_on_page) > 30;
SELECT visitor_id, MAX(time_spent_on_page) AS max_time_spent FROM website_traffic WHERE visitor_id IN (1, 5, 10) GROUP BY visitor_id ORDER BY max_time_spent DESC;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic ORDER BY visitor_id DESC;
SELECT visit_date, page_visited FROM website_traffic WHERE traffic_source = 'Organic' ORDER BY visit_date ASC;
SELECT visitor_id, visit_date, page_visited FROM website_traffic WHERE visit_date > '2022-01-01' AND page_visited LIKE 'homepage%' ORDER BY visit_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM online_sales WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card' AND total_amount > 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM online_sales WHERE customer_id = 12345 ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic WHERE visit_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT visitor_id, page_visited FROM website_traffic WHERE page_visited = 'Homepage' ORDER BY visit_date DESC
SELECT * FROM online_sales WHERE total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM online_sales WHERE payment_method = 'Credit Card'
SELECT * FROM website_traffic WHERE traffic_source = 'Organic'
SELECT * FROM website_traffic ORDER BY date_visited DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT page_visited, duration_minutes FROM website_traffic WHERE visitor_id = 12345;
SELECT product_name, price, category FROM e_commerce_platform WHERE category = 'Electronics';
SELECT total_amount FROM online_sales WHERE status = 'Completed' ORDER BY order_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM e_commerce_platform WHERE price > 100 ORDER BY price DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic WHERE duration_minutes > 10 ORDER BY date_visited DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT customer_id, COUNT(order_id) AS total_orders FROM online_sales GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_orders > 2 ORDER BY total_orders DESC;
SELECT product_name, price FROM e_commerce_platform WHERE price > 100 AND category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY price ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT customer_id, SUM(total_amount) AS total_spent FROM online_sales GROUP BY customer_id HAVING total_spent > 500 ORDER BY total_spent DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT visitor_id, AVG(duration_minutes) AS average_duration FROM website_traffic GROUP BY visitor_id HAVING average_duration < 20 ORDER BY average_duration ASC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic WHERE id = 1;
SELECT page_name, timestamp FROM website_traffic WHERE visitor_id = 5;
SELECT customer_id, total_price FROM sales ORDER BY total_price DESC;
SELECT * FROM customers WHERE address = '123 Main Street';
SELECT name, price FROM products WHERE price < 50.00;
SELECT * FROM website_traffic WHERE visitor_id = 12345;
SELECT page_name, timestamp FROM website_traffic WHERE timestamp BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT c.name, c.email, s.total_price FROM customers c INNER JOIN sales s ON c.customer_id = s.customer_id WHERE s.total_price > 1000;
SELECT p.name, p.price, s.quantity, s.total_price FROM products p INNER JOIN sales s ON p.product_id = s.product_id WHERE s.quantity > 5 ORDER BY s.total_price DESC;

SELECT wt.page_name, c.name, wt.timestamp, s.total_price FROM website_traffic wt INNER JOIN sales s ON wt.visitor_id = s.customer_id INNER JOIN customers c ON s.customer_id = c.customer_id WHERE s.total_price > 500 ORDER BY s.total_price ASC;
SELECT * FROM website_visits
SELECT visitor_id, page_visited FROM website_visits WHERE referral_source = 'Google'
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products ORDER BY price DESC
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE phone_number LIKE '+1%'
SELECT * FROM sales_orders WHERE total_amount > 1000
SELECT product_name, price, stock_quantity FROM products
SELECT customer_name, email, phone_number FROM customers
SELECT promotion_name, start_date, end_date FROM promotions
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date, total_amount FROM sales_orders
SELECT visit_id, visit_time, visitor_id, page_visited, referral_source FROM website_visits
